item.title: About me
item.description: Here goes some links! Useful Links: If the coding is hard, try to Rubber Duck! Python paleomagnetic tools. My lab’s GitHub. To read list: Qinghua Zhang, Dawei Lu, Dingyi Wang, Xuezhi Yang, Peijie Zuo, Hang Yang, Qiang Fu, Qian Liu, and Guibin Jiang (2020) Environmental Science & Technology 54 (15), 9274-9284 DOI: 10.1021/acs.est.0c01841. Recommended articles: Gonet, T., & Maher, B. A. (2019). Airborne, vehicle-derived Fe-bearing nanoparticles in the urban environment: a review.
